doc.previous: Regarding the lack of legal certainty provided by the statement Paley writes
doc.after: Likewise the Libre Society drafted two libre licences but celebrated their lack of legal power 36 They are the Res Divini Juris Licence and the Res Communes Licence but neither is in common use
